name: beatPath
description:
Don't worry about staying on beat, just follow the path!

A fast-paced typing game (of sorts) that to be frank, sounds kinda terrible. 

Instructions
  • Hit the key that corresponds to the note on screen.  You do not necessarily need to follow the order, though it sure does sounds a lot nicer if you do!
  • Every 20 points, you gain an extra life!
  • Fill up the bonus meter by not missing any beats, and clear the screen for tons of points
  • Survive for as long as you can!
